name: Stealth Quest
description:
Stealth Quest is a game created for game jam themed "30-second quest".

Genre: 3rd person stealth game

Objective:
Obtain item and proceed unnoticed by the guards.

Controls:
- w, a, s, d or d-arrow to move player
- 'J' to interact or select
- 'L' to cancel selection

Bugs to be fixed:
- Unlocked door countdown doesn't work.
- Can't proceed to level 3.

Made with:
- Unity3D (Gameplay)
- Blender (3D models and animations)
- Paint.net (Texture)
- FL Studio, Audacity, and BFXR (Music and SFX)

Tested on Windows 10 64-bit.

Development time: 18 days (approx. - 3hr/day)

Please provide feedback hopefully we can create better stealth games in the future, ^.^
Enjoy!
